titles: A Software Engineer, Professor and Researcher

labs.intro: Here's a list of some of my personal projects and others that I've been involved in professionally. I am currently studying/practicing the following topics

links.intro: Here I gather some of what I've been reading, watching, listening to or playing. The links here generally take you to streaming sites or stores so you can buy or subscribe to a service. Feel free to report me any wrong information here. Browse the categories if you prefer, or type a term in the search box.
